text: Eliezer Goldberg (; 24 May 1931 â€“ 12 March 2022) was an Israeli politician and lawyer. He was on the Supreme Court of Israel from 1983 until 1988. He was the State Comptroller of Israel from 1998 until 2005. Goldberg was born in Jerusalem. Goldberg died on 12 March 2022 in Jerusalem at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Jerusalem Category:Israeli judges Category:Lawyers from Jerusalem
title: Eliezer Goldberg
